description.raw:
I apologize; I should have tested pull request #85. The folder had already been symlinked, so moving it was a problem:
~~~
+ mv /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-homebrew-amd64-2/gazebo /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-homebrew-amd64-2/gazebo6
mv: rename /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-homebrew-amd64-2/gazebo
 to /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-homebrew-amd64-2/gazebo6/gazebo:
 Invalid argument
~~~
I think it's better to copy the entire folder and clean it up each time.
